description: Once off the main road, follow a series of twists and turns uphill to reach the village of Acquapartita, at an altitude of almost 800m, where you’ll find one of the best restaurants in the region....
facilitiesServices: Car park, Interesting wine list, Wheelchair access
creditCards: American Express credit card, Credit card / Debit card accepted, Diners Club credit card, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
